description:
Hildegard von Mariendorf is one of the principal characters in the series. She served as the New Galactic Fleet`s Chief Advisor, and later reigned with http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] when she became his wife and Empress in U.C.801. She was remembered by history as the one who nurtured the Lohengramm Dynasty to maturity, after her husband has established it.
Hildegard, usually referred to by the nickname Hilde, was born in Galactic year 777 into an undistinguished noble family of the the Goldenbaum dynasty, the sole daughter of the benevolent and just Count http://anidb.net/ch203 [Franz von Mariendorf]. From an early age, she was distinguished from the other girls of the aristocrat society by her independent ideas. Completely unconcerned, Hilde pursued her own interests in reading, politics and history. Her mother having died when Hilde was young, her open-minded father respected Hilde`s unique ideas and choices in life.
name: Hildegard von Mariendorf
